name: Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO)
description: Providers of RPO services manage all or part of a company's recruitment process, from job posting to onboarding, to improve efficiency and reduce costs.

name: Contingent Workforce Management
description: Companies that provide contingent workforce management services help organizations manage their temporary, contract, or freelance workers, including sourcing, onboarding, and payroll management.

name: Executive Search
description: Executive search firms specialize in recruiting high-level executives and professionals for senior leadership positions, often using a retained search model.

name: Staffing Agencies
description: Staffing agencies provide temporary, contract, or permanent staffing solutions to organizations, often specializing in specific industries or job functions.

name: Recruitment Marketing
description: Recruitment marketing providers help organizations develop and implement strategies to attract, engage, and hire top talent, often using digital marketing channels.

name: Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS)
description: ATS providers offer software solutions that help organizations manage job postings, candidate applications, and resumes, streamlining the recruitment process.

name: Background Screening
description: Background screening providers offer services to verify the accuracy of candidate information, including criminal records, education, and employment history.

name: HR Consulting
description: HR consulting firms provide strategic guidance and support to organizations on HR-related issues, including recruitment, talent management, and benefits administration.

name: Online Recruitment Platforms
description: Online recruitment platforms provide a digital marketplace for job seekers and employers to connect, often featuring job posting, resume database, and applicant management tools.

name: Talent Management
description: Talent management providers offer solutions to help organizations develop, engage, and retain their employees, including performance management, succession planning, and leadership development.

name: Payroll and Benefits Administration
description: Payroll and benefits administration providers offer services to manage employee compensation, benefits, and compliance, often including payroll processing, tax filing, and benefits enrollment.

name: Outplacement Services
description: Outplacement services providers help organizations support employees during restructuring or downsizing, offering career transition support, resume building, and job placement assistance.
